title: Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun (Toilet-bound Hanako-kun)
synopsis: The famous "Seven Wonders" that every school seems to have are a staple of Japanese urban legends. One of the most well-known of these tales is that of Hanako-san: the ghost of a young girl who haunts the school's bathrooms.
characters: ['Hanako-kun', 'Yashiro, Nene', 'Minamoto, Kou', 'Mitsuba, Sousuke', 'Yugi, Tsukasa', 'Tsuchigomori', 'Aoi, Akane', 'Nanamine, Sakura', 'Akane, Aoi', 'Minamoto, Teru']
